# What is Docker?

--

  ## Docker is a tool developed by .text-hl[Google]
  ## to ease the process of development and deployment of applications using 
  ## .font2[CONTAINERS]
  
---

class: middle center bg-main1 hide-slide-number

# How does Docker works?

--
  
  ## Docker is an interface that manages different Containers in a single machine. It conceals different versions of environments, .text-hl2[OSs, Programs, Packages and Scripts] developed by the user, in images.

# What is the difference?

--
  <div class = "bullet">
  <ul>
  <li> This format of development allows the developers to have access to a more stable platform, ensuring reproducibility; </li>
  <li> It abstracts a lot of the management necessary to run virtual machines that most developers are not interested; </li>
  <li> Besides, given the ease of configuration for the images, it allows the deployment and update of multiple services in a faster way. </li>
  </ul>
  </div>
